CHAT.comment: Home Visit 7; Mom sits on couch. Michael is seated on floor besides her. Book is to his side. Writes atop his Trapper which his mom suggested he get.

Chi asks EXP a few procedural questions and writes the letter by himself. He glances through the book but doesn't read it carefully. At the end , he asks Mot for help spelling sincerly. She's not sure; neither are we. Signing the letter was mentioned by EXP at the beginning.

u.a: talks to Mot about the weather , which is a snowstorm
MOT and EXP talk about the family cats
a small amount of whispering occurs about halfway through this pause , but it's unclear who speaks , and on what topic
EXP and Mot talk about the cat
